void EmGenderCelListener::CallGender ( const std::vector< double > &  contrast,
const double  em_thresh,
const double  em_cutoff,
const double  gender_cutoff,
affx::Gender &  gender,
double &  hcr 
) [static]

EM-based gender calling algorithm, call gender on a single sample.

Parameters:
contrast - vector of allele contrasts from SNPs on X chromosome
em_thresh - threshold on EM's confidence of labelling
em_cutoff - cutoff on total number of SNPs passed em's threshold, below cutoff return unknown
gender_cutoff - cutoff on percentage of heterozygotes of SNPs which passed the threshold
gender - gender var to be filled in
hcr - estimated chrX het rate to be filled in
